welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Burlington, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burlington International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Burlington International Airport is used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plattsburgh International Airport houses all passenger services and amenities.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Plattsburgh International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
